channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management

item.title: CVE-2017-1191|2024-09-16T19:36:39.319Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: An undisclosed vulnerability in CLM applications (including IBM Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management 4.0, 5.0, and 6.0) with potential for failure to restrict URL Access. IBM X-Force ID: 123661.

item.title: CVE-2017-1240|2024-09-16T18:43:58.108Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Rhapsody DM products could reveal sensitive information in HTTP 500 Internal Server Error responses. IBM X-Force ID: 124359.

item.title: CVE-2017-1715|2024-09-16T18:44:00.493Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Rational Quality Manager and IBM Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management 5.0 through 5.0.2 and 6.0 through 6.0.5 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 134637.

item.title: CVE-2017-1655|2024-09-16T18:08:14.457Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation (IBM Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management 5.0 and 6.0) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 133379.

item.title: CVE-2019-4083|2024-09-16T18:03:28.200Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation products (IBM Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management 6.0 through 6.0.6.1) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 157383.

item.title: CVE-2018-1658|2024-09-16T16:14:06.764Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation (IBM Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management 5.0 through 6.0.6) is vulnerable to HTTP header injection, caused by improper validation of input. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject arbitrary HTTP headers, which will allow the attacker to conduct various attacks against the vulnerable system, including cross-site scripting, cache poisoning or session hijacking. IBM X-Force ID: 144884.

item.title: CVE-2017-1241|2024-09-16T19:37:03.093Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: An unspecified vulnerability in IBM Jazz Foundation based applications might allow the display of stack trace information to an attacker. IBM X-Force ID: 124523.

item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation products (IBM Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management 6.0 through 6.0.6.1) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 159648.

item.description: IBM Team Concert (RTC including IBM Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management 4.0, 5.0., and 6.0) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. item.description: IBM Jazz Team Server products are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2017-1295|2024-09-16T19:57:35.000Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM RSA DM contains unspecified vulnerability in CLM Applications with potential for information leakage. IBM X-Force ID: 125157.

item.title: CVE-2019-4252|2024-09-16T18:23:47.067Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management 6.0 through 6.0.6.1 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 159883.

item.title: CVE-2020-4524|2024-09-16T19:09:56.582Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation products is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 182434.

item.title: CVE-2021-20346|2024-09-16T16:12:46.143Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation and IBM Engineering products are vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). This may allow an authenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 194595.

item.title: CVE-2017-1524|2024-09-16T18:08:30.656Z -- ibm -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation (IBM Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management 5.0 and 6.0) could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information from a specially crafted HTTP request that could be used to aid future attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 129970.
